name: Theatrix
description: A simple theatre management system application built with Express.js and Supabase, designed for managing movies and shows. Data is stored securely in the cloud using Supabase. This project features CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) for movies and shows, accessed via a custom API.

name: VIT FFCS Planner
description: The FFCS VIT Timetable Planner is a straightforward and user-friendly tool designed to help VIT students organize their course schedules efficiently. It allows users to select their desired courses and instantly see how their weekly timetable shapes up. The planner highlights any timing conflicts, making it easier to adjust and finalize selections. With a clean and intuitive interface, students can manage their courses without hassle and even save or load timetable drafts as needed.

name: Slate
description: Slate is a simple, MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) application for creating, reading, updating, and deleting notes. It provides a minimal interface for productivity and easy note management. This project features CRUD operations for notes, accessed via a custom-built API.

name: Portfolio
description: The website you are currently on! This is a static website built with React, focused on clean design and simplicity. It uses React components to organize content efficiently and provide a smooth user experience.
